p: Dry matter (67.38%) was positively correlated with axis 2. The species with high content of dry matter were Tamarindus indica, Ceiba pentandra, Grewia carpinifolia, Maerua angolensis, Vernonia amygdalina, Opilia amentacea, Afzelia africana, Telfairia occidentalis, Pterocarpus soyauxii and Lecaniodiscus cupanioides ( Appendix 4, Fig.Â 6).
